doctor.name: Dr. AKM Fazlul Haque
doctor.info: Dr. AKM Fazlul Haque completed his MBBS from Dhaka Medical College followed by FRCS from Edinburg, UK. He has worked as a Plastic Reconstruction and Cosmetic Surgeon at NHS Hospital, UK for 30 years. Prior to joining Evercare Hospital Dhaka, he worked as a Plastic and Cosmetic Surgeon at Russells Hall Hospital, Birmingham, UK for 12 years. He is an expert in various plastic and cosmetic surgery procedures, including Scar Revision, Skin Grafting, Repair of Cleft Lip and Cleft Palate, Brow/Forehead Lift, Eyelid Lift and Face Lift, Ear Pinning and Ear Reshaping, Nose Reshaping and Rhinoplasty, Lip Reshaping, Botox and Fillers (Collagen and Fat Injectable Fillers), Breast Augmentation and Mastopexy (Breast Lift), Breast Reduction and Reconstruction, Correction of Gynecomastia, Abdominoplasty (Tummy Tuck), Liposuction and Lipoplasty, Tattoo Removal, Management of Hand Injury and Congenital Anomalies of Hand. Dr. AKM Fazlul Haque is experienced in the management of burn patients and skin tumour, cancer removal & reconstruction.

chamber.address: Plot # 81, Block # E, Bashundhara R/A, Dhaka

doctor.name: Dr. Raihan Anwar
doctor.workplace: Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College
doctor.info: Dr. Raihan Anwar is a skilled Plastic, Reconstructive, and Aesthetic Surgeon in Dhaka, holding an MBBS and MS in Plastic Surgery, with fellowship training in Plastic, Hand, and Microsurgery from India. He currently serves as a Junior Consultant in the Department of Plastic Surgery at Birdem General Hospital & Ibrahim Medical College. Dr. Raihan Anwar specializes in the treatment of burn injuries, cosmetic and reconstructive surgeries, hand injuries, facial trauma, skin grafting, keloid and scar management, and aesthetic procedures. He consults patients at BIRDEM Specialized Chamber Complex, Main Building, 122, Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, Shahbag, Dhaka, with visiting hours from 3pm to 5pm (closed on Friday).

chamber.address: Main Building, 122, Kazi Nazrul Islam Avenue, Shahbag, Dhaka
